member.name: M:GhAPIAzure.Controllers.ControlHistoryController.PostControllHistory(System.Collections.Generic.List{DatabasePOCOs.User.ControlHistory})
member.summary: Accepts a list of control histories you want to edit.
member.param: A list of control Histories that you want to add or edit. This accepts delta updates. So you can add a control history that has only one new datapoint each, and it will just add it on top of what's already in the DB
member.returns: Ok if all good, otherwise you will get an ErrorResponce

member.name: M:GhAPIAzure.Controllers.Private.PeopleController.GetMe
member.remarks: Gets account info, creates account if it's not there
